Threat Description: Attackers can manipulate data in JBoss 1.2 due to improper access controls or vulnerabilities in the application using the database.
Countermeasure: Implement proper access controls and encryption for sensitive data, and regularly update the application with the latest security patches.
ASVS Reference: OWASP Application Security Verification Standard (ASVS) - Data Validation and Encryption
SANS Reference: SANS Institute - Securing Web Applications with OWASP
CIS Reference: Center for Internet Security (CIS) - Web Application Security Best Practices
MITRE Tactics Description: Attackers can manipulate data in JBoss 1.2 to gain unauthorized access or disrupt the application's functionality.
MITRE Techniques Description: Attackers can use data encoding techniques to manipulate data in JBoss 1.2 and bypass security controls.
